title: Suyojit Group Appoints Rahul Gugaliya as CEO Designate
text:
Friday, September 18, 2015 5:05PM IST (11:35AM GMT) Suyojit Group Appoints Rahul Gugaliya as CEO Designate Nasik, Maharashtra, India 
Established in 1994, Suyojit Group, Nasik’s diversified business conglomerate with an eclectic presence in Real Estate Development, Infrastructure Development, Land Acquisition, Mega Food Park, BOT Projects & Mushroom Parks has appointed Mr. Rahul Gugaliya, as the Designate Chief Executive Officer. Mr. Rahul Gugaliya joins Suyojit Group with wide experience in Business Development, Brand Management, Marketing, Sales, Customer Relationship Management & Operations Management across different industries, namely Godrej Properties Ltd., Kolte – Patil Developers Ltd. in Real Estate; Anand Automotives, Ceat Tyres Ltd. in Manufacturing; multinationals like Videocon and Cyberstar International in Singapore. Rahul has completed his post- graduation from one of India’s top business schools – NITIE, Mumbai. While announcing the appointment, Mr. Anant Rajegaonkar and Mr. Anil Jain, Co-Chairman, Suyojit Group said, “The appointment of Rahul Gugaliya as CEO Designate – Suyojit Group is a good and far-sighted choice. We have been impressed with his caliber and leadership abilities at this young age. His astute observations and vision will definitely help our businesses to grow faster.” On this occasion, Mr. Rahul Gugaliya commented, “In the span of 21 years Suyojit Group has grown multi-fold and developed new avenues to grow. I am honoured to get this responsibility of taking Suyojit Group to new heights. I am committed to deliver best results for all our stake holders.” The real estate arm of Suyojit Group - Suyojit Infrastructure Pvt. Ltd. has successfully executed more than 30 prestigious Industrial, Institutional, Commercial, Residential, Infrastructure and many more construction projects in private & public sector. The company has also worked with few of the international clients. Suyojit Group Background M/s Suyojit Group, established in 1994, is promoted by Mr. Anant K Rajegaonkar and Mr. Anil B Jain. The Real Estate arm of the Group has successfully executed more than 30 prestigious Industrial, Institutional, Commercial, Residential, Infrastructure and many more construction projects. Their client base includes Indian private & public sector companies and Multinational clients. Suyojit Infrastructure Pvt. Limited has been awarded with ISO 9001:2000 Certification and is also approved as class 1-A contractors with P.W.D. The Group currently has 15 projects under construction in Nasik & Pune which include Townships, Malls, Commercial, Industrial and Residential complexes and SEZ’s. Over the last two decades, the group has also stepped into diverse business verticals and gained recognition and success in areas like Infrastructure Development, Land Acquisition, Mega Food Park, BOT Projects & Mushroom Parks.
